name: Emma's Magical Mixtures
description:
This was created as the third, of five, Rapid Prototype Production (RPP) projects. The game is intended to teach the basics of color theory; mixing red, blue, and yellow to create purple, green, orange, and brown. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement in all directions

R - Access paint palette 

E - Collect paint within environment and paint objects

Mouse - Mix colors that are contained on the paint palette

Bug: While playing, the player must access the paint palette (R) before collecting paint onto it, otherwise, it will not recognize that they have received the first blue.
